page.title: 20Stockbridge C.P.School Team.
page.content:
The members of class 4 at Stockbridge Primary School who took part in the Domesday Project were :
Emma Coombes Michael Curtis Ruth Howell Andrew Curtis Joanne Curtis Ian Henderson Michelle Everitt David Pounds Joanna Summerfield Gary Cooper Melanie Perry Lee Taplin Harriet Forester Russell Geary Sarah Burnfield James Norton Emilie Roberts Richard Maidment Della Hardy Dominic Parrott Alison Hunt Paul Goudry Katy Mason Alistair Inglis Helen Barnes Matthew Pratt Elizabeth Wahnon Richard Geary
We would like to thank the many local people,especially parents who have helped us with our survey work.
